title: Getting trolled by a 4-man chinese premade (mid kinda tried tho, wrong friends I guess)
body: Not much to say, all they did was spam in chat while they casually walked up to the enemy team, just asking to be killed, and the jungler even tried flaming me in the worst english I've ever seen when I complained about his suicides. Is it possible to instantly ban people from other servers as soon as they troll or intentionally loses a game? Having games thrown by EUW d-heads is stressing enough, don't need chinese cun** doing that as well, it's frustrating as hell... and in the end who pay are players like me who get pissed off and provoked like that, fair system I'd say.

They can be playing from NA since they're currently there physically (I don't believe you can even connect back to CN if you're overseas atm even if you want to, due to region blocking iirc). Or they can be from CN, but got banned hence they can only play cross-server, as CN and KR require citizenship to register accounts meaning you only ever get 1 account on those servers.

Either way, let's not assume that they're intentionally just crossing servers to troll, because there are multiple legit scenarios to why they are at NA. Not to mention, since RIot does not endorse region locking so you can't restrict where people are playing from anyway (CN servers are not owned by Riot so they operate on a different term, hence having region locking).

What's more important is the trolling itself. Let's not confuse the act of trolling with their national identity as the latter is really not relevant.
